title: Fire Fighter Rain Fund
description: On November 13, 2016, Rain was only 9 years old. When He had founded, Fire Fighter Rain Fund. Rain has over a 100 published books online. 10% of all Rain Fields children's book sale, will benefit Fire Fighter Rain Fund. To purchase new clothes,shoe,furniture and toys. For kids under the age of 18 years old, in United States. Who has lost their home in a fire or a flood.
author: Dionne L Fields
